items.sentence: We waited a long time, but Tom didn't show up.
I'm sure that if you work hard you'll succeed.
I'm nervous when speaking in another language.
I'm not above begging in order to get the job.
My father tried to teach us the value of work.
Our apartment is starting to look pretty cool.
My son made a small bear out of pipe cleaners.
Their family name is written on their mailbox.
My new job leaves me little time to socialize.
I'm waiting for some of my friends to join me.
